title: Tool Time
description: Binford Tools is proud to present Tim “The Tool Man” Taylor! Power tools, gadgets, cars, occasional electrocution, and plenty of grunting.
quote: Does everybody know what time it is?
alt2: Tim tries to poke Al in the eyes
alt3: Al and Tim are wearing powered stilts and Tim has shot through the fake ceiling
alt4: Tim accidentally glues his head to a piece of wood
